info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 03 at 11:59AM CST until February 03 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CST FOR FORREST AND SOUTHERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 1159 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mclaurin, or 8 miles south of Hattiesburg, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Petal and Sunrise around 1210 PM CST. Macedonia around 1220 PM CST. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
